channel.title: Admin for a day
channel.description:
Hey guys. So I was wondering if Moparisthebest had to go for a day and the day he was going was very important, he had to chose another person. If that person was you (the head admin) what would you do for the day? Here are a few questions you may answer, just a few ideas to get you going. [b]Remember that you don't HAVE to answer these questions, they are just few question ideas you might want to answer or relate to[/b].
- Who would you ban/mute? - Who would you unban/unmute? - Who would you promote/demote? - What topics would you sticky? - What forum updates would you do? - How would you use the rest of your power? - What rules would you make?
Let's also imagine that when Moparisthebest gets back, he would not do anything to what you did. So your changed would of had stayed. And also, mods please dont take it seriously, because this thread is just for what people WOULD do if they wereunder control for MITB and MoparScape.

item.title: Admin for a day
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

[quote=“Mendorphins, post:75, topic:368658”]- Who would you ban/mute? Emtec - he has just posted like 20+ topics on advertising his website spamming the shit out Server Downloads.

- Who would you unban/unmute? I don’t know anyone.

- Who would you promote/demote? Maybe I’d promote someone if they handled trolls and haters well, with assertive rather than aggressive posts/spam/flaming back.But with consistency, not based on one post.

- What topics would you sticky? There shouldn’t be too many stickies in a forum. It should only be stickied if it has the potential to change bad habits, or guide us all in the right direction. I probably wouldn’t sticky anything as I don’t like to speak for everyone.

- What forum updates would you do? I doubt anything as it’s not my forum to update. It’s fine the way it is.

- How would you use the rest of your power? Use and abuse! Nah, I wouldn’t use it for nothing because in all theory I’m still just me, not a well known and respected member of the community, so it wouldn’t change peoples perception of me.

- What rules would you make? Maybe more strict on the off-topic-ness nature of the forums. Something’s not right, this board has developed a bad image in some people’s eyes because of the first thing they see. Flame wars. You can guarantee to come across it in your time here. I don’t know how the staff operate and what they let slide, but it can almost always get out of hand before action is taken. Just my opinion, if it was my board, I’d probably be less lenient.[/quote]Perfect admin right there.

Read full topic

item.title: Admin for a day
item.dc:creator: @Mendorphins Mendorphins
item.description:
@Mendorphins wrote:

- Who would you ban/mute? Emtec - he has just posted like 20+ topics on advertising his website spamming the shit out Server Downloads.

- Who would you unban/unmute? I don’t know anyone.

- Who would you promote/demote? Maybe I’d promote someone if they handled trolls and haters well, with assertive rather than aggressive posts/spam/flaming back.But with consistency, not based on one post.

- What topics would you sticky? There shouldn’t be too many stickies in a forum. It should only be stickied if it has the potential to change bad habits, or guide us all in the right direction. I probably wouldn’t sticky anything as I don’t like to speak for everyone.

- What forum updates would you do? I doubt anything as it’s not my forum to update. It’s fine the way it is.

- How would you use the rest of your power? Use and abuse! Nah, I wouldn’t use it for nothing because in all theory I’m still just me, not a well known and respected member of the community, so it wouldn’t change peoples perception of me.

- What rules would you make? Maybe more strict on the off-topic-ness nature of the forums. Something’s not right, this board has developed a bad image in some people’s eyes because of the first thing they see. Flame wars. You can guarantee to come across it in your time here. I don’t know how the staff operate and what they let slide, but it can almost always get out of hand before action is taken. Just my opinion, if it was my board, I’d probably be less lenient.

Read full topic
